title: Ben Affleck Comes to Meryl Streep’s Defense: ‘If There’s One Thing That We Know Is True…’
text:
Ben Affleck Comes to Meryl Streep’s Defense: ‘If There’s One Thing That We Know Is True…’ by J.D. Durkin | 8:06   video 
It may not be a total surprise to see other Hollywood A-Listers comes to the defense of Meryl Streep in light of her controversial acceptance speech Sunday night at the Golden Globes ; after all, given the reactions from other elites in the room that night, her anti-Trump commentary seemed to be largely appreciated and embraced. 
But that didn’t stop Ben Affleck — whose brother Casey took home an acting Golden Glove for his turn in Manchester By The Sea — from offering his two cents on Jimmy Kimmel Live Monday. Affleck invoked Streep’s name on his own shortly after taking a seat, telling host Jimmy Kimmel , “If there’s one thing we know is true, it’s that Meryl Streep is NOT overrated!” 
He further joked that calling Streep “overrated” is akin to calling Gandhi “a terrible leader.”“But pick a better shot rather than the person whose photograph actually accompanies ‘Great Actress’ in the Encyclopedia,” Affleck continued telling Kimmel. 
Affleck’s comment was in direct response to the President-elect, who predictably took to Twitter Monday morning to harangue the legendary actress for her on-stage rhetoric.
